ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: WHAH!
ygData.msgSnippet: The game cards are good tooo. Then you can pay with Cash ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? LAUNCH - Your Yahoo! Music
ygData.messageBody:
The game cards are good tooo.

Then you can pay with Cash


--- Kuervodr@... wrote:
> "ss4songohan2001" wrote:
>
> "i wanna play everquest! i need a game card number
> or credit card to
> play the game. so now i have a everquest trilogy for
> nothin WHAH!"
>
> Umm yeah. If you had read the whole box, you
> probably would have noticed it says "Valid credit
> card required." written in bold capital letters on
> the rear.
>
> If you dont have a credit card, try seeing if a
> good friend of yours might let you charge it to
> his/her credit card. Or maybe your parents. Another
> option would be to open a checking account, at a
> bank, that has a Visa Check Card instead of a plain
> ol' debit card. Works just like a credit card but
> the money just comes directly out of you checking
> account.
>
>
>
>
>
